item.description: Nginx配置 nginx.conf配置 server { listen 80; listen [::]:80; server_name www.domain.com domain.com; return 301 https://$server_name$request_uri; } # HTTPS服务器 server { listen 443 ssl; listen [::]:443 ssl; server_name www.domain.com domain.com; # 网站根目录 root /usr/share/nginx/domain; index index.html index.htm; # SSL ssl_session_cache shared:SSL:1m; ssl_session_timeout 10m; ssl_ciphers PROFILE=SYSTEM; ssl_protocols TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3; ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on; proxy_ssl_server_name on; location / { } error_page 404 /404.html; location = /40x.html { } error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; location = /50x.
